item.title: Collar Type With Cup Filler Machine
item.dc:creator: zarainternational
item.description:
Brand: Zara International
  • Material Pack: Powder, granules, Tea, Snacks, Puff, Kurkure, etc
  • Weight: 50 grams to 250 gram
  • High Speed Production 

The post Collar Type With Cup Filler Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
Collar Type with Cup Filler Machine.

We have made recognition from our consumers by producing and delivering the best quality range of Collar Type Cup Filler Machines. With the knowledge and hard work of our organization, we have manufactured this using premium quality components in reference to industry norms. Our products are examined and tested by our quality assurance team. This Collar Type Cup Filler Machine can be used for filling and sealing the pouches or cups that are filled with materials as per requirements.

Features:

  • Material Pack: Powder, granules, Tea, Snacks, Puff, Kurkure, etc
  • Weight: 50 grams to 250 gram
  • High Speed Production 
  • Long service life
  • Robust construction
  • Low maintenance
  • Packaging Material: Heat salable Laminated
  • Films Roll Width: Max-425mm, Min.120 mm
  • Pouch Dimension: -200mm
  • Electrical Supply: 230v/AC/Single Phase/50Hz
  • Compressed Air Required: 6CFM,6 bar
  • Weight: 400 Kg (Approx)
  • Filling Range: Cup filler Adjustable
  • Pouch Type: Centre Seal Pouch
  • Height : 65-300mm
  • Power Consumption: 3Kw
  • Production Rate: 60 shots per minute(Varies with the nature of product & Filling range)
  • Machine Dimension : L-1050mm,W990 mm,H1360mm

item.title: Tea/Coffee Packing Machines
item.dc:creator: zarainternational
item.description:
Brand: Zara International

FEATURES:-

• Easy operation. No training required for starting up, operation, or maintenance is easy.
• All core components are from internationally well-established and reputed companies which we use in the machine's construction.
• Spares parts are also available on-demand at fair prices. Our technical support available all around the year.
• Available in 220 volts AC single phase / 110 volts AC single-phase power supply.

The post Tea/Coffee Packing Machines appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
Tea/coffee Packing Machines

We have introduced a subversive new bench-top, a very cost-effective machine to pack teas, herbal powders, yerba dust mate, oolong tea, granulate coffee beans which can be packed in pre-made filter tea bags with or without string & tag, also with or without the outer envelopes. The counter-top equipment enables you to calculate the product material weight and swiftly measure the quantity weight.

We can fill the tea bags and sachet without spilling the filling materials and then seal the pouch/sachets instantly. In this way, the machinery helps customers to fill and seal from a few tea bags/sachets to a few hundred of tea bags in just a few minutes.

The SIKRI Filler Sealer is a single operator run machine that requires an operator to fill the tea bags and then seal it. Then the operator drops the tea into the tea bags with the help of a foot switch which is attached to the machine, thus it keeps both the hands free of the operator enabling faster production.

We provide Pre-made tea bags in different sizes along with this machine for filling different infusion items of teas and powder and also Pre-made Plain paper and PE/ foil laminates for packing food/ dipping products. This machine is also available 4 set series of volumetric cups with different opening diameters of 15 mm, 20mm, 25mm, and 30mm that comes along this machine.

Depending on the material type and quantity of tea, an operator can change the cup themselves. This process is very convenient and takes only about 2 minutes to change cups as per requirements. The adjustments can be done manually and it does not require any special tools for it.

The SIKRI Filler sealer is the optimal ENTRY LEVEL DEVICE for small industries and in-home business of tea bag production. 

FEATURES:-

• Easy operation. No training required for starting up, operation or maintenance is easy.
• All core components are from internationally well-established and reputed companies which we use in the machine’s construction.
• Spares parts are also available on-demand at fair prices. Our technical support available all around the year.
• Available in 220 volts AC single phase / 110 volts AC single-phase power supply.
• Available in fully clad with stainless steel SS 304 ISI, and also with complete stainless steel isi SS 304 contact parts.
• Proper filling and smooth weight adjustment with a sharp precision volumetric cup filler.
• This machine is portable and can be kept on a typical work table and used directly.
• No special circuitry and servicing are required. The device can be attached to an ordinary domestic plug-point.

SPECIFICATIONS:-
Machine Configuration bench Top Volumetric Filler with an Impulse Sealer Attached
Filling Range Up to 10 grams (Custom Filling Also Available)
Pouch Size Any pre-made pouch as per require
Pouch material Any heat sealable polymer like PE, OPP, etc, any heat-sealable material like filter bag paper, heat- seal foil, etc, or any laminate.
Other Container Packing It Can be used to fill small bottles, cans, etc.
Operating Voltage 220 V AC 1P 50 Hz/110V AC 1P 60 Hz
Power Rating 750 Watts
Machine Dimension (Main Body) 12″× 18″× 11″ Height, 300 mm × 450 mm × 275 mm Height
Net Weight 50 Kilograms (110 pounds) Approx

The post Tea/Coffee Packing Machines appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.

item.title: Flow Wrap Packaging Machine
item.dc:creator: zarainternational

  • Features:

    • Longer working life

The post Flow Wrap Packaging Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
Flow Wrap Packaging Machine

We have established an enormous customer base in the national as well as in the foreign markets by producing and supplying top quality of Flow Wrap Packaging Machine. The given machine is completely constructed by our organization in adherence to set industry benchmarks.

Also, this machine is assessed by our quality control team on various criteria before dispatching. Besides this, we can mainly use the provided Flow Wrap Packaging Machine for packaging the materials like chocolates, toffee, candies, bread, biscuits, ice cream, sweets etc.

 

These horizontal flow wrapping machines are absolutely best suitable for packing varied items. This range of horizontal flow wrap machine is noiseless and provides hassle-free operation. They are used to wrapping a diverse range of materials like chocolates, toffee, candies, bread, biscuits, ice cream, sweets, automotive parts, soap, cake, candy, bearing, and instant noodles. We also offer these Horizontal Flow Wrap Machines in the various customized specifications, as per the client’s requirements.

Features:

  • Space-efficient design
  • Top Class performance
  • Longer working life

Applications

Food industry Toffee, Candies, Cakes, Confectionery, Chocolates, Candles, etc.
Pharma & medicine Industry Catheters, I.V Bottles, Syringes, hand gloves, Medicines, Diapers, etc.
Engineering & Automotives screws, spare parts, Bearing, electrical & electronic parts.
Other Industries Audio/CD, Stationery, Pencils, Sharpeners, Bopp Tapes, Educational Packs, Magazines, Credit Cards, etc.

The post Flow Wrap Packaging Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
